name: TheWizard'sGambleDemoV1
description:
Our Kickstarter link!:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/adamantine-entertain/the-wizards-gamble

The Wizards Gamble is a Medieval-Fantasy-style Action Platformer in the vein of favorite action adventure games of yore!  A grand overarching story concerning magic, The Gods, and Man's fate lies before you.  

  Known Issues: 

FOR BEST RESULTS, PLAY IN WINDOWED MODE!  Beautiful Graphics Setting

- AI is simple and needs to be expanded on, Flying mob in particular needs better detection 

- Some missing particle & sound FX, musical transitions are rough and need polish 

- Game UI designed only for 16:9 resolutions, so resolution choices are currently limited.  

- Micro-stutters may occur, game needs to be optimized

Thanks for playing!
